name: Lightweight-bootstrap
tagline: An extremely lightweight bootstrap starter template with offloaded CSS and JS
body:
Lightweight Bootstrap is exactly what it sounds like... an extremely lightweight bootstrap starter template. 

All you need to use it is a web server. The CSS and JS are even offloaded to the Bootstrap CDN so all you need to serve up
is this page.

This page is completely open source, feel free to use it and do whatever the heck you want with it!

### Authors and Contributors
Template originally created by the Twitter Bootstrap team, modified and thinned out by Brendan Carlson (@brendancarlson)

### Support or Contact
Need Help? Feel free to contact me by the email on my profile.

---- As this is basic and meant to be a starting template, I'd like to keep it simple. However, If you'd like to modify it feel free to do a pull request. ----
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
